attributes.action: Enact a law forcing Charley Rance to write a sitcom based on her life and her various rantings on the BSG
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Charley is probably the funniest woman i've ever met, and i've met over 2. She should be given a kick up the bum bum to force her to start writing a sitcom based on the life and times of Charley Rance.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
